---
name: Documentation
about: Improve or add documentation
title: '[DOCS] '
labels: documentation
assignees: ''
---

## What needs documentation?
Be specific about the area, feature, or topic that needs documentation

## Current State
What exists now (if anything)? Include links to current documentation.

## Desired State
What should be documented? What information is missing or unclear?

## Target Audience
Who is this documentation for?
- [ ] End users (managers, employees)
- [ ] Developers (contributors, maintainers)
- [ ] API consumers (integrators)
- [ ] System administrators (deployment, configuration)

## Suggested Structure
Provide an outline or table of contents for the documentation

## Related Code/Features
Links to relevant files, features, or existing documentation

## Examples to Include
- Code samples that should be included
- Screenshots or diagrams needed
- Use cases or scenarios to document

## Additional Context
Any other information that would help document this properly
